markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jalmeri Rakshasa Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=3941) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 33</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Beastbrood](/Feats.aspx?ID=2449)

</column>

---

You can cast [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) and [_reaper's lantern_](/Spells.aspx?ID=710) once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells. _Reaper's lantern_ manifests as a lantern shaped like the head of your rakshasa incarnation.
name: Jalmeri Rakshasa Magic
